description: Starts the workflow when TheHive events occur

properties.name: notice
properties.displayName: You must set up the webhook in TheHive â€” instructions here

properties.name: events
properties.description: Events types

properties.name: Alert Created
properties.description: Triggered when an alert is created

properties.name: Alert Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when an alert is deleted

properties.name: Alert Updated
properties.description: Triggered when an alert is updated

properties.name: Case Created
properties.description: Triggered when a case is created

properties.name: Case Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when a case is deleted

properties.name: Case Updated
properties.description: Triggered when a case is updated

properties.name: Comment Created
properties.description: Triggered when a comment is created

properties.name: Comment Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when a comment is deleted

properties.name: Comment Updated
properties.description: Triggered when a comment is updated

properties.name: Observable Created
properties.description: Triggered when an observable is created

properties.name: Observable Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when an observable is deleted

properties.name: Observable Updated
properties.description: Triggered when an observable is updated

properties.name: Page Created
properties.description: Triggered when an page is created

properties.name: Page Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when an page is deleted

properties.name: Page Updated
properties.description: Triggered when an page is updated

properties.name: Task Created
properties.description: Triggered when a task is created

properties.name: Task Updated
properties.description: Triggered when a task is updated

properties.name: Task Log Created
properties.description: Triggered when a task log is created

properties.name: Task Log Deleted
properties.description: Triggered when a task log is deleted

properties.name: Task Log Updated
properties.description: Triggered when a task log is updated

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Filter any incoming events based on their fields

properties.name: operator
properties.description: Field is equal to value

properties.name: Not Equal
properties.description: Field is not equal to value

properties.name: Includes
properties.description: Field includes value

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to output data with additional details and omit headers
